title: Minister Attaf receives a phone call from his Tunisian counterpart
text: The Minister of Foreign Affairs and the National Community abroad, Mr. Ahmed Attaf, received a phone call from his Tunisian counterpart, Nabil Ammar who congratulated him on his appointment by the President of the Republic, Mr. Abdelmadjid Tebboune, to head the Algerian diplomacy.

The two ministers have discussed, on this occasion, the fraternal relations and cooperation between Algeria and Tunisia which are experiencing a significant development under the high patronage of the Presidents of the two brotherly countries, reaffirming their willingness to pursue efforts to preserve this momentum through the exchange of visits and strengthening political coordination, in addition to intensifying bilateral cooperation in various fields.
